entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening then becoming west 20 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
